attributes.action: Stop the govt from reducing A Level and GCSE grades by 33%
attributes.additional_details:
No school will set a child up for something they cannot achieve, that would be senseless. 
Uni places already hang in the balance. The govt has already u turned on the date results will be available and children’s mental health is suffering. 

All students with conditional offers have their futures at risk, this is wrong... bright kids, deserving kids, hard-working kids having their futures ripped away.. please help us get this petition to parliament ASAP before more kids’ lives are destroyed.
attributes.background:
We call on Boris Johnson to intervene now and stop this.
Stop the reduction in grades and keep them as they have been predicted.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that GCSE and A-level students will receive their centre assessment grades: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/gcse-and-a-level-students-to-receive-centre-assessment-grades

Prior to this announcement being made, we had published the following petitions, calling for similar actions to your request: 

Reverse all exam grades back to teacher’s own predictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334491

Review the decision to use previous data to calculate exam grades: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306773

Allow free and accessible appeals of GCSE and A Level calculated grades: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334013
